front.title: GMPLS Routing Extension for Optical Transport Networks with Beyond 100G in G.709 Edition 5

abstract.t: The International Telecommunication Union Telecommunication Standardization Sector (ITU-T) has extended the Recommendation G.709 to support beyond 100G (B100G) features. Corresponding Open Shortest Path First - Traffic Engineering (OSPF-TE) routing protocol extensions are included in this document.
